page.title: 11TAKING PART IN SPORT
page.content: {CLUBS:} Swimming, Diving, Badminton, {AT THE} Gymnastics, Trampolining, {CENTRE} Squash, 5 a side football. {ROLLERMANIA:} Every Saturday I go to the rollermania from 18.30 - 20.30. It costs Â£1.20. We play games and do actions to music. Sharon Jones (10 yrs) {BADMINTON:}is a popular leisure sport. There are 7 courts. You can play singles or doubles. Claire Taylor, Elizabeth Nunn (10 yrs) {SWIMMING:}Our school goes swimming once a week. We gain distance awards and are taught how to save ourselves in water. Chris Willoughby (10 yrs) {SAUNA AND SOLARIUM:}This is in the basement. People visit it and feel refreshed after the hot steam and cold bath. Janice White (10 yrs)
